custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (BookmarksEntry.groupId = ?) AND [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {BookmarksEntry.*} FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE (entryId NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.BOOKMARKS.MODEL.BOOKMARKSENTRY$] ))
